contentrichtext.text: '''Cynthia Kereluk''' (born 9 January 1962) is a [[physical fitness|fitness]] and [[exercise]] guru from [[British Columbia]], [[Canada]]. In 1984 she won the [[Miss Canada]] title and competed in [[Miss Universe 1984]]. From 1985 to 2000 she reached both a Canadian (WTN) and [[United States|American]] (''[[Lifetime (TV network)|Lifetime]]'' cable network) audience through [[television]] with her exercise program, ''Everyday Workout''. She has held fitness workshops and telephone consultations; she has contributed to exercise videos and books; and she has produced her own videos which demonstrate her technique. Kereluk has had small parts in three movies; ''[[Mark of Cain (film)|Mark of Cain]]'' (1985, aka ''Identity Crisis''), ''[[Not Another Dirty Little Movie]]'' (1986, aka ''Overnight''), ''[[The Pink Chiquitas]]'' (1987). On September 24, 2007 Kereluk married [[England|English]] rock singer-songwriter [[Paul Rodgers]], best known for being a member of [[Free (band)|Free]] and [[Bad Company]], as well as a member of [[The Firm (rock band)|The Firm]] and [[The Law (band)|The Law]]. He has recently toured and recorded with [[Queen (band)|Queen]]. They were wed in a surprise outdoor ceremony in British Columbia's [[Okanagan Valley]]. ==External links == * {{imdb name | id = 0449280 | name = Cynthia Kereluk }} *[http://www.starman-imaging.com/cynthia_k/home.htm Images of Everyday Workout] {{s-start}} {{succession box | before=Jodi Yvonne Rutledge | title=[[Miss Canada]] | years= 1984 | after=Karen Elizabeth Tilley }} {{s-end}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kereluk, Cynthia | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 9 January 1962 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kereluk, Cynthia}} [[Category:1962 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Canadian television hosts]] [[Category:Miss Universe 1984 contestants]] [[Category:Miss Canada winners]]
